member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes
member.summary: Contains the values for the AnimationTypes enumeration that contains various built in animations graphics.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.Ball
member.summary: Busy indication with jumping ball type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.Battery
member.summary: Busy indication with battery charging type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.Box
member.summary: Busy indication with box arrangement type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.DoubleCircle
member.summary: Busy indication with rotation of double circle type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.ECG
member.summary: Busy indication with live ECG type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.Globe
member.summary: Busy indication with globe type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.Gear
member.summary: Busy indication with gear type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.HorizontalPulsingBox
member.summary: Busy indication with box with pulsing type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.MovieTimer
member.summary: Busy indication with movie timer type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.None
member.summary: Displays this animation if its animation type is set as None.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.Print
member.summary: Busy indication with printer type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.Rectangle
member.summary: Busy indication with jumping rectangle type animation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.RollingBall
member.summary: Busy indication with ball that roll on a circle type animation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.SingleCircle
member.summary: Busy indication with circle type animation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.SlicedCircle
member.summary: Busy indication with sliced circle type animation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes.ZoomingTarget
member.summary: Busy indication with Zooming type animation.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.TitlePlacement
member.summary: Contains the values for the TitlePlacement enumeration that contains various built in title positions.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.TitlePlacement.Top
member.summary: Displays the Title at top of the animation position.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.TitlePlacement.Bottom
member.summary: Displays the Title at Bottom of the animation position.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.TitlePlacement.None
member.summary: Title will not be displayed.
